description: More than your average button down, prana's Edgewater Long Sleeve Shirt has a brushed fabric feel you'll definitely want to work into your weekly wardrobe. Made with a sustainable fabric mix, this woven texture looks good in all sorts of situations. Work, play, travel, you name it. Dress it up with chinos or keep it casual with your favorite jeans.They even added some extra details to take it to the next level, Like not one, but two chest pockets with button-flap closures for extra security. And a slot in the left pocket for carrying a pen on the go.
name: Prana Edgewater LS Shirt - Slim - Mens
